alert.message: Counter L3_BVI_ING_NO_UIDB_DROP has 1:1 correlation with CC Errors recorded on Video Equipments. In case this counter is non-zero and recurrent should be checked with Video engineers if there is any degradation in traffic.
alert.name: L3_BVI_ING_NO_UIDB_DROP alert

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(last("drop_value")) FROM "asr9k_drops" WHERE ("hostname" = 'nl-ams02e-ra60' AND "drop_name" = 'L3_BVI_ING_NO_UIDB_DROP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "drop_name", "drops_of", "node", "hostname" fill(null)
